title: You know how people say it takes more muscles to frown than to smile?
body:
I think it's the opposite for me. It always feels like it takes me more effort to smile unless I'm watching something funny or hear a good joke. Frowning and scowling is easier for me. Is something wrong with me? Am I just a curmudgeon or what? 

http://i.imgur.com/CcnYeaq.png
